word: "This Worldly Policy has Wrestled for the Victory Among Seventh-Day Adventists, and the principles which should have been kept pure and unadulterated Have Been Overcome, and Selfishness has Come Into the Very Courts of the Lord. The Lord has permitted those who did not love the light, who departed from a plain 'Thus saith the Lord,' to walk in the sparks of the fire of their own kindling; but he says. 'They shall lie down in sorrow.'
